00017 /* For strcasestr prototype in string.h on Linux64 */
00018 #define _GNU_SOURCE
00019 
00020 #include "MisrReadData.h"
00021 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00022 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00023 #include "MisrError.h"
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 #include <stdlib.h>
00026 #include <math.h>
00027 #include <hdf.h>
00028 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00029 
00039 MTKt_status MtkReadL2Land(
00040   const char *filename,     
00041   const char *gridname,     
00042   const char *fieldname,    
00043   MTKt_Region region,       
00044   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf, 
00045   MTKt_MapInfo *mapinfo      )
00046 {
00047   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00048   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status code for error macros */
00049   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS File id */
00050   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF return status */
00051 
00052   if (filename == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00053 
00054   /* Open file. */
00055   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00056   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00057 
00058   /* Read data. */
00059   status = MtkReadL2LandFid(fid, gridname, fieldname, region, databuf, mapinfo);
00060   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00061 
00062   /* Close file. */
00063   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00064   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00065   fid = FAIL;
00066 
00067   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00068  ERROR_HANDLE:
00069   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00070   return status_code;
00071 }
00072 
00078 MTKt_status MtkReadL2LandFid(
00079   int32 fid,                
00080   const char *gridname,     
00081   const char *fieldname,    
00082   MTKt_Region region,       
00083   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf, 
00084   MTKt_MapInfo *mapinfo      )
00085 {
00086   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00087   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status code for error macros */
00088   MTKt_MapInfo map = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00089                                 /* Map info structure */
00090   MTKt_DataBuffer buf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00091                                 /* Data buffer structure */
00092   MTKt_DataBuffer rawbuf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00093                 /* Raw data buffer structure */
00094   MTKt_DataBuffer min = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00095                 /* Minimum for unscaling */
00096   MTKt_DataBuffer max = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00097                 /* Maximum for unscaling */
00098   MTKt_DataBuffer offset = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00099                 /* Offset for unscaling */
00100   MTKt_DataBuffer scale = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00101                 /* Scale for unscaling */
00102   MTKt_DataBuffer fill = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00103                 /* Fill flag value */
00104   MTKt_DataBuffer overflow = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00105                 /* Overflow flag value */
00106   MTKt_DataBuffer underflow = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00107                 /* Underflow flag value */
00108   char *field;          /* Pointer to field to read */
00109   char fieldstr[MAXSTR];    /* Field string */
00110   char *fieldarr[2];        /* Field array */
00111   char *sp;         /* Pointer to string */
00112   char attr[MAXSTR];        /* Attribute name */
00113   int attrcnt = 0;      /* Attribute count */
00114   MTKt_boolean flag;        /* Flag field requested */
00115   MTKt_boolean raw;     /* Raw field requested */
00116   int l;            /* Line index */
00117   int s;            /* Sample index */
00118   char *basefield = NULL;   /* Base fieldname */
00119   int nextradims;               /* Number of extra dimensions */
00120   int *extradims = NULL;    /* Extra dimension list */
00121 
00122   if (gridname == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00123   if (fieldname == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00124 
00125   /* ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00126   /* Parse fieldname to determine unpacking or unscaling method */
00127   /* ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00128 
00129   /* Make a working copy of fieldname */
00130   strncpy(fieldstr, fieldname, MAXSTR);
00131   fieldarr[0] = fieldstr;
00132   
00133   /* Separate raw/flag from base field */
00134   if ((sp = strchr(fieldstr, ' ')) != NULL) {
00135     *sp = '\0';
00136     fieldarr[1] = ++sp;
00137   } else if ((sp = strchr(fieldstr, '\0')) != NULL) {
00138     fieldarr[1] = sp;
00139   } else {
00140     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00141   }
00142 
00143   /* ------------------------------------------------ */
00144   /* Determine if raw/native or flags is in fieldname */
00145   /* ------------------------------------------------ */
00146 
00147   if ((sp = strcasestr(fieldname, "raw")) != NULL ||
00148       (sp = strcasestr(fieldname, "native")) != NULL) {
00149     flag = MTK_FALSE;
00150     raw = MTK_TRUE;
00151     field = fieldarr[1];
00152   } else if ((sp = strcasestr(fieldname, "flag")) != NULL) {
00153     flag = MTK_TRUE;
00154     raw = MTK_FALSE;
00155     field = fieldarr[1];
00156   } else {
00157     flag = MTK_FALSE;
00158     raw = MTK_FALSE;
00159     field = fieldarr[0];
00160   }
00161 
00162   /* -------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00163   /* Read scale, offset, fill, underflow and overflow value, if available */
00164   /* -------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00165 
00166   status = MtkParseFieldname(field, &basefield, &nextradims, &extradims);
00167   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00168 
00169   if (raw == MTK_FALSE) {
00170     strncpy(attr, "Min ", MAXSTR);
00171     strncat(attr, basefield, strlen(basefield));
00172     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, attr, &min);
00173     if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) attrcnt++;
00174 
00175     strncpy(attr, "Max ", MAXSTR);
00176     strncat(attr, basefield, strlen(basefield));
00177     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, attr, &max);
00178     if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) attrcnt++;
00179 
00180     strncpy(attr, "Scale ", MAXSTR);
00181     strncat(attr, basefield, strlen(basefield));
00182     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, attr, &scale);
00183     if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) attrcnt++;
00184 
00185     strncpy(attr, "Offset ", MAXSTR);
00186     strncat(attr, basefield, strlen(basefield));
00187     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, attr, &offset);
00188     if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) attrcnt++;
00189 
00190     strncpy(attr, "Fill ", MAXSTR);
00191     strncat(attr, basefield, strlen(basefield));
00192     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, attr, &fill);
00193     if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) attrcnt++;
00194 
00195     strncpy(attr, "Underflow ", MAXSTR);
00196     strncat(attr, basefield, strlen(basefield));
00197     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, attr, &underflow);
00198     if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) attrcnt++;
00199 
00200     strncpy(attr, "Overflow ", MAXSTR);
00201     strncat(attr, basefield, strlen(basefield));
00202     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, attr, &overflow);
00203     if (status == MTK_SUCCESS) attrcnt++;
00204   }
00205 
00206   /* --------------------------------------------------------------- */
00207   /* Determine which unpacking or unscaling method to do, then do it */
00208   /* --------------------------------------------------------------- */
00209 
00210   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00211   /* Read, unpack and unscale LandHDRF and LandBRF fields, only if  */
00212   /* raw or flag is not set. These two fields are a special case    */
00213   /* unpacking and unscaling alogrithm.  The raw field is shifted   */
00214   /* left two bits.                                                 */
00215   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00216 
00217   if (attrcnt == 7 && flag == MTK_FALSE && raw == MTK_FALSE &&
00218       ((strncmp(basefield, "LandHDRF", MAXSTR) == 0 &&
00219     strncmp(basefield, "LandHDRFUnc", MAXSTR) != 0) ||
00220        strncmp(basefield, "LandBRF", MAXSTR) == 0)) {
00221 
00222     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &rawbuf, &map);
00223     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00224 
00225     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(rawbuf.nline, rawbuf.nsample, MTKe_float, 
00226                                    &buf);
00227     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00228 
00229     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00230       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00231         if (rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] == fill.data.u16[0][0]) {
00232       buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)fill.data.u16[0][0];
00233     } else if (rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] == underflow.data.u16[0][0]) {
00234           buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)underflow.data.u16[0][0];
00235     } else if (rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] == overflow.data.u16[0][0]) {
00236       buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)overflow.data.u16[0][0];
00237     } else {
00238           buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)((rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] >> 1) * 
00239                                           scale.data.f[0][0]) +
00240                                       offset.data.f[0][0];
00241         }
00242       }
00243     }
00244 
00245   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00246   /* Read, unpack and unscale all fields that have scale and offset */
00247   /* offset values, only if raw or flag is not set.                 */
00248   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00249 
00250   } else if (attrcnt == 7 && flag == MTK_FALSE && raw == MTK_FALSE) {
00251 
00252     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &rawbuf, &map);
00253     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00254 
00255     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(rawbuf.nline, rawbuf.nsample, MTKe_float, 
00256                                    &buf);
00257     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00258 
00259     switch(rawbuf.datatype) {
00260     case MTKe_uint8:
00261       for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00262     for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00263       if (rawbuf.data.u8[l][s] == fill.data.u8[0][0]) {
00264         buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)fill.data.u8[0][0];
00265       } else if (rawbuf.data.u8[l][s] == underflow.data.u8[0][0]) {
00266         buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)underflow.data.u8[0][0];
00267       } else if (rawbuf.data.u8[l][s] == overflow.data.u8[0][0]) {
00268         buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)overflow.data.u8[0][0];
00269       } else {
00270         buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)(rawbuf.data.u8[l][s] * 
00271                    scale.data.f[0][0]) + offset.data.f[0][0];
00272       }
00273     }
00274       }
00275       break;
00276     case MTKe_uint16:
00277       for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00278     for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00279       if (rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] == fill.data.u16[0][0]) {
00280         buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)fill.data.u16[0][0];
00281       } else if (rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] == underflow.data.u16[0][0]) {
00282         buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)underflow.data.u16[0][0];
00283       } else if (rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] == overflow.data.u16[0][0]) {
00284         buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)overflow.data.u16[0][0];
00285       } else {
00286         buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)(rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] * 
00287                    scale.data.f[0][0]) + offset.data.f[0][0];
00288       }
00289     }
00290       }
00291       break;
00292     default:
00293       MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DATATYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED);
00294       break;
00295     }
00296 
00297   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00298   /* Read and only unpack LAIDelta1 and LAIDelta2, only if raw or   */
00299   /* flag is not set. The negative sign (flag) needs to be stripped */
00300   /* to produce the actual real value.                      */
00301   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00302 
00303   } else if (attrcnt == 0 && flag == MTK_FALSE && raw == MTK_FALSE &&
00304          (strncmp(basefield, "LAIDelta1", MAXSTR) == 0 ||
00305           strncmp(basefield, "LAIDelta2", MAXSTR) == 0)) {
00306 
00307     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &buf, &map);
00308     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00309 
00310     status = MtkFillValueGetFid(fid, gridname, field, &fill);
00311     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status)
00312 
00313     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00314       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00315         if (buf.data.f[l][s] != fill.data.f[0][0]) {
00316           buf.data.f[l][s] = fabsf(buf.data.f[l][s]);
00317         } else {
00318           buf.data.f[l][s] = buf.data.f[l][s];
00319         }
00320       }
00321     }
00322 
00323   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00324   /* Read flag value for LandHDRF and LandBRF fields, only if flag  */
00325   /* is set to true.                            */
00326   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00327 
00328   } else if (attrcnt == 7 && flag == MTK_TRUE && raw == MTK_FALSE &&
00329          ((strncmp(basefield, "LandHDRF", MAXSTR) == 0 &&
00330            strncmp(basefield, "LandHDRFUnc", MAXSTR) != 0) ||
00331           strncmp(basefield, "LandBRF", MAXSTR)  == 0)) {
00332 
00333     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &rawbuf, &map);
00334     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00335 
00336     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(rawbuf.nline, rawbuf.nsample, MTKe_uint16, 
00337                                    &buf);
00338     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00339 
00340     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00341       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00342         if (rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] != fill.data.u16[0][0] &&
00343         rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] != underflow.data.u16[0][0] &&
00344         rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] != overflow.data.u16[0][0]) {
00345           buf.data.u16[l][s] = rawbuf.data.u16[l][s] & 0x0001;
00346         } else {
00347           buf.data.u16[l][s] = rawbuf.data.u16[l][s];
00348         }
00349       }
00350     }
00351 
00352   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00353   /* Read flag value for LAIDelta1 and LAIDelta2 fields, only if    */
00354   /* flag is set to true.                       */
00355   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00356 
00357   } else if (attrcnt == 0 && flag == MTK_TRUE && raw == MTK_FALSE &&
00358          (strncmp(basefield, "LAIDelta1", MAXSTR) == 0 ||
00359           strncmp(basefield, "LAIDelta2", MAXSTR) == 0)) {
00360 
00361     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &buf, &map);
00362     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00363 
00364     status = MtkFillValueGetFid(fid, gridname, field, &fill);
00365     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status)
00366 
00367     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00368       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00369         if (buf.data.f[l][s] != fill.data.f[0][0]) {
00370           buf.data.f[l][s] = buf.data.f[l][s] < 0.0f ? -1.0f : 1.0f;
00371         } else {
00372           buf.data.f[l][s] = buf.data.f[l][s];
00373         }
00374       }
00375     }
00376 
00377   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00378   /* Read all other fields that don't require unpacking/ unscaling. */
00379   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00380 
00381   } else if (flag == MTK_FALSE) {
00382 
00383     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &buf, &map);
00384     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00385 
00386   } else {
00387     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NOT_FOUND);
00388   }
00389 
00390   free(basefield);
00391   free(extradims);
00392   MtkDataBufferFree(&rawbuf);
00393   MtkDataBufferFree(&min);
00394   MtkDataBufferFree(&max);
00395   MtkDataBufferFree(&offset);
00396   MtkDataBufferFree(&scale);
00397   MtkDataBufferFree(&fill);
00398   MtkDataBufferFree(&overflow);
00399   MtkDataBufferFree(&underflow);
00400 
00401   *databuf = buf;
00402   *mapinfo = map;
00403 
00404   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00405  ERROR_HANDLE:
00406   if (basefield != NULL) free(basefield);
00407   if (extradims != NULL) free(extradims);
00408   MtkDataBufferFree(&buf);
00409   MtkDataBufferFree(&rawbuf);
00410   MtkDataBufferFree(&min);
00411   MtkDataBufferFree(&max);
00412   MtkDataBufferFree(&offset);
00413   MtkDataBufferFree(&scale);
00414   MtkDataBufferFree(&fill);
00415   MtkDataBufferFree(&overflow);
00416   MtkDataBufferFree(&underflow);
00417   return status_code;
00418 }
